```{js}
// JavaScript code to handle button clicks
document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function() {
    let continueButton = document.getElementById("continue-button");
    let tutorialParts = document.querySelectorAll(".tutorial-part");

    let currentPartIndex = 0;

    continueButton.addEventListener("click", function() {
        if (currentPartIndex < tutorialParts.length) {
            tutorialParts[currentPartIndex].style.display = "block";
            currentPartIndex++;
        } else {
            alert("End of tutorial");
        }
    });
});
```
